testcase.name: verify file contains correct output
testcase.system-out: Given Files "InstrumentDetails.csv" and "PositionDetails.csv"...............passed When processed in the system................................................passed Then verify "PositionReport.csv" file.......................................passed

testcase.name: Verify if User is able to click on various get options - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given "Chrome" browser is opened............................................passed When user opens application url in the browser..............................passed Then user click on "List users" with "GET" http request.....................passed Then users sees "/api/users?page=2" and "200" and "total,12"................passed

testcase.name: Verify if User is able to click on various get options - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given "Chrome" browser is opened............................................passed When user opens application url in the browser..............................passed Then user click on "List <resource>" with "GET" http request................passed Then users sees "/api/unknown" and "200" and "total,12".....................passed

testcase.name: verify Support button is displayed
testcase.system-out: Given "Chrome" browser is opened............................................passed When user opens application url in the browser..............................passed Then user click on SupportReqResp button....................................passed Then user sees one time support option......................................passed And sees monthlysupport option..............................................passed And sees SupportReqResp button to upgrade...................................passed

testcase.name: testRestAPI PostMethod
testcase.system-out: Given AddUserPayload........................................................passed When user calls "post" http request.........................................passed Then the API call got success with status code 201..........................passed And "name" in response body is "morpheus"...................................passed

testcase.name: testRestAPI PostMethod
testcase.system-out: Given PathParameter 2.......................................................passed When user calls "get" http request..........................................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "data.id" in response body is "2".......................................passed
